section.title: Valve.VR.SteamVR_Action_Boolean Class Reference

para.para: Boolean actions are either true or false. There are a variety of helper events included that will fire for the given input source. They're prefixed with "on".

section.para: Inheritance diagram for Valve.VR.SteamVR_Action_Boolean:

listitem.para: delegate void StateDownHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource)
delegate void StateUpHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource)
delegate void StateHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource)
delegate void ActiveChangeHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource, bool active)
delegate void ChangeHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource, bool newState)
delegate void UpdateHandler (SteamVR_Action_Boolean fromAction, SteamVR_Input_Sources fromSource, bool newState)
SteamVR_Action_Boolean ()
bool GetStateDown (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Returns true if the value of the action has been changed to true (from false) in the most recent update.
bool GetStateUp (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Returns true if the value of the action has been changed to false (from true) in the most recent update.
bool GetState (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Returns true if the value of the action (state) is currently true
bool GetLastStateDown (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
[For the previous update] Returns true if the value of the action has been set to true (from false).
bool GetLastStateUp (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
[For the previous update] Returns true if the value of the action has been set to false (from true).
bool GetLastState (SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
[For the previous update] Returns true if the value of the action was true.
void AddOnActiveChangeListener (ActiveChangeHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the functional active state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes. This happens when the action is bound or unbound, or when the ActionSet changes state.
void RemoveOnActiveChangeListener (ActiveChangeHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)

Stops executing a function when the functional active state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes. This happens when the action is bound or unbound, or when the ActionSet changes state.
void AddOnActiveBindingChangeListener (ActiveChangeHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the active state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes. This happens when the action is bound or unbound
void RemoveOnActiveBindingChangeListener (ActiveChangeHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Stops executing the function setup by the corresponding AddListener
void AddOnChangeListener (ChangeHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes
void RemoveOnChangeListener (ChangeHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Stops executing the function setup by the corresponding AddListener
void AddOnUpdateListener (UpdateHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the state of this action (with the specified inputSource) is updated.
void RemoveOnUpdateListener (UpdateHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Stops executing the function setup by the corresponding AddListener
void AddOnStateDownListener (StateDownHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes to true (from false).
void RemoveOnStateDownListener (StateDownHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Stops executing the function setup by the corresponding AddListener
void AddOnStateUpListener (StateUpHandler functionToCall, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Executes a function when the state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes to false (from true).
void RemoveOnStateUpListener (StateUpHandler functionToStopCalling, SteamVR_Input_Sources inputSource)
Stops executing the function setup by the corresponding AddListener
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] This event fires whenever a state changes from false to true or true to false
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] This event fires whenever the action is updated
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] This event fires whenever the boolean action is true and gets updated
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] This event fires whenever the state of the boolean action has changed from false to true in the most recent update
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] This event fires whenever the state of the boolean action has changed from true to false in the most recent update
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] Event fires when the active state (ActionSet active and binding active) changes
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] Event fires when the bound state of the binding changes
bool state [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] True when the boolean action is true
bool stateDown [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] True when the boolean action is true and the last state was false
bool stateUp [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] True when the boolean action is false and the last state was true
bool lastState [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] (previous update) True when the boolean action is true
bool lastStateDown [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] (previous update) True when the boolean action is true and the last state was false
bool lastStateUp [get]
[Shortcut to: SteamVR_Input_Sources.Any] (previous update) True when the boolean action is false and the last state was true

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Boolean actions are either true or false. There are a variety of helper events included that will fire for the given input source. They're prefixed with "on".

section.title: AddOnActiveBindingChangeListener()

para.para: Executes a function when the active state of this action (with the specified inputSource) changes. This happens when the action is bound or unbound

entry.para: A local function that receives the boolean action who's active state changes and the corresponding input source
The device you would like to get data from. Any if the action is not device specific.
